meta.title: Olivier Jeannette | Digital Operations & Automation Specialist
meta.description: Digital Operations & Automation Specialist with commercially validated expertise in process optimization, custom software development, and business intelligence. Available in Calgary, Alberta.

hero.tagline: I build digital systems that drive measurable business growth.
hero.subtitle: Commercially validated expertise in process automation, custom software, and data-driven marketing. Helping SMEs eliminate operational waste and scale efficiently.

about.label: Economic Impact
about.title: Proven Business
bio: I specialize in transforming manual business operations into automated, scalable digital systems. My approach combines custom software development, process automation, and data-driven marketing to deliver measurable ROI.

This is not theory. I built, scaled, and operated a service-sector SME generating €120K in annual revenue while simultaneously developing its entire digital infrastructure: custom management software (replacing €3K/year in SaaS), automated billing and CRM workflows, and SEO strategies that achieved Top 3 organic search rankings.

My cross-functional background — from tactical operations management to hands-on software development — means I understand both the business logic and the technical implementation. I build solutions that work in the real world, not just in demos.

alberta.label: Alberta Relevance
alberta.title: Why Alberta Needs
points: Alberta's SME ecosystem represents over 95% of businesses — most need digital modernization but lack in-house technical resources.
Process automation and custom software directly reduce operational costs, helping Alberta businesses stay competitive in a diversifying economy.
Cross-sector digital operations expertise is immediately transferable — from energy services to agriculture, retail to professional services.
Commercially validated skills with measurable economic impact: every project I deliver generates traceable revenue or cost savings.

caseStudies.label: Case Studies
caseStudies.title: Proven
caseStudies.subtitle: Detailed breakdowns of real projects with measurable business outcomes.

albertaCta.title: How These Capabilities Benefit Alberta Businesses
albertaCta.description: Every system I build is designed to be transferable and scalable. The same process automation, custom software, and data-driven marketing strategies that generated €120K in annual revenue for a French SME are directly applicable to Alberta's business ecosystem.

smeTransformation.title: SME Digital Transformation
smeTransformation.subtitle: End-to-end digitization of a service-sector business
smeTransformation.problem: A service-sector SME operating with entirely manual processes: paper-based client management, no online presence, no automated billing, and no performance analytics. The business was losing revenue to competitors with modern digital infrastructure.
solution: Built a custom management application (Next.js + Supabase) replacing €3K/year in SaaS subscriptions
Implemented automated billing, CRM, and follow-up workflows using Make and N8N
Developed SEO-optimized website achieving Top 3 Google ranking for target keywords
Created data dashboards for real-time business intelligence and decision-making
Designed and executed Meta Ads campaigns and conversion funnels
results: Business prepared for turnkey sale with fully documented systems

automationSuite.title: Business Process Automation Suite
automationSuite.subtitle: Cross-functional workflow automation with AI integration
automationSuite.problem: Daily business operations consumed excessive manual time: invoicing errors, missed follow-ups, inconsistent reporting, and disconnected data sources across multiple platforms.
solution: Designed and deployed integrated automation workflows (Make + N8N)
Automated invoicing with zero-error billing pipeline
Built AI-powered task handling using Claude API integration
Created automated reporting and data synchronization across platforms
Implemented webhook-driven event systems for real-time process triggers
results: Fully documented and transferable automation library

cta.title: Ready to discuss how digital operations can benefit your organization?
cta.description: I'm available in Calgary, Alberta for roles in digital operations, process automation, and technical project management. Let's discuss how I can deliver measurable value to your team.

summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.content: Digital Operations & Automation Specialist with a unique trajectory: Special Forces Combat Paramedic turned entrepreneur and self-taught developer. Built and operated a service-sector SME generating €120K/year while developing its entire digital infrastructure solo — custom management software, automated workflows, SEO strategy, and data-driven marketing. Seeking roles in Digital Operations, Process Automation, or Technical Project Management in Alberta.

interested.title: Interested?
interested.description: Download my complete resume in PDF format or contact me directly.

laskali.title: Digital Operations Manager & Founder
description: Built and scaled a service-sector business from zero to €120K/year in a market with 5+ direct competitors
WORKLOAD: 72h/week (9am-9pm, Mon-Sat), 6 years — demonstrating exceptional capacity for sustained high-output execution
CUSTOM SOFTWARE: Developed bespoke management application replacing €3K/year in SaaS subscriptions (Next.js, Supabase, Stripe)
PROCESS AUTOMATION: Implemented Make/N8N workflows for billing, CRM follow-ups, reporting, and cross-platform data synchronization
DIGITAL MARKETING: SEO strategy achieving Top 3 Google ranking, Meta Ads campaigns, conversion funnel optimization
WEB DEVELOPMENT: Built complete web presence with booking system, client portal, and administrative dashboard
P&L MANAGEMENT: Full financial oversight — budgeting, pricing strategy, cost optimization, tax compliance
REVENUE OPERATIONS: Sales funnel design, B2B partnership negotiations (Gymlib, Wellpass, HYROX)
Preparing business for turnkey sale with fully documented processes and transferable digital systems

coaching-career.title: Client Services & Business Development
description: 3-year progression from entry-level to certified professional, demonstrating rapid skill acquisition
Obtained BPJEPS AF state certification — French professional diploma requiring 12-month intensive program
Built independent client portfolio through direct acquisition, retention strategies, and referral systems
Developed service delivery processes and client management frameworks
Foundation experience that led to founding and scaling a service-sector SME

military.title: Special Forces Operator - Combat Paramedic
description: 7 years in French Special Forces unit (13ème Régiment de Dragons Parachutistes)
Combat Paramedic: tactical medical care and emergency response in high-stakes environments
Multiple operational deployments to Africa and Middle East
Team pharmacy manager and medical logistics coordinator
TCCC specialist (Tactical Combat Casualty Care) — advanced trauma management under fire
Core competencies developed: autonomous decision-making, crisis management, systematic problem-solving, operational resilience
